sentences.sContent: The trial was held under tight security .
sentences.sCn: 这场审讯是在戒备森严的情况下进行的。

sentences.sContent: lax security at airline check-in desks
sentences.sCn: 登机手续柜台松懈的安全措施

sentences.sContent: terrorist activity that is a threat to national security
sentences.sCn: 威胁国家安全的恐怖活动

sentences.sContent: The prison was ordered to tighten security after a prisoner escaped yesterday.
sentences.sCn: 昨天一名囚犯越狱后，该监狱被勒令加强安全措施。

sentences.sContent: The Security Commission investigates breaches of security .
sentences.sCn: 安全委员会对违反安全规定的事项进行调查。

sentences.sContent: We have been asked not to say anything for security reasons .
sentences.sCn: 出于安全考虑，我们被要求守口如瓶。

sentences.sContent: The security forces opened fire, killing two people.
sentences.sCn: 保安部队开枪打死了两个人。

sentences.sContent: The thief was caught on a security camera .
sentences.sCn: 小偷被保安摄像机当场拍了下来。

sentences.sContent: There are strict security checks on everyone entering the Opera House.
sentences.sCn: 每个人进入歌剧院都要接受严格的安全检查。

sentences.sContent: A large number of homes lack adequate security measures .
sentences.sCn: 许多住宅都未采取足够的安全措施。

sentences.sContent: ...letting go of the safety and security of the past gives us great fear...
...But it seems reasonable to think sunscreen gives people a false sense of security in the sun...
...and the inspection of nuclear security was carried out nationwide...
...With the improvement in technology and security measures...
...His retired parents would certainly have had less economic security back then...
...But you have to come with me to the security office...
...Seventy-eight-year-old Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg's job security is guaranteed in the Constitution...
...good wages and benefits and job security motivate workers...

phrases.pCn: 网络安全；网络安全性；网络保密
粮食安全；食品安全；食物保障

words.tran: 安全的；无虑的；有把握的；稳当的
安全的；可靠的（secure的比较级形式）
安全地；牢固地；安心地；有把握地
获得安全；船抛锚；停止工作

trans.tranOther: things that are done to keep a person, building, or country safe from danger or crime
